mapper.select: select M.*, O.*, OD.*, P.* from member M left join Orders O on M.id = O.id right join OrderDetails OD on OD.orderUid = O.orderUid left join product P on P.name = O.orderName where M.id=#{id}
select name from member where id=#{id}
mapper.update: update member set pw=#{pw} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from member where id=#{id} and name=#{name}
select pw from member where id=#{id}
select nickname from member where nickname=#{nickname}
select id from member where id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into member (id, pw, name, birthday, nickname, gender, point, tel, postcode, addr, addr2, authority) values (#{id},#{pw},#{name},#{birthday},#{nickname},#{gender},0,null,0,null,null,0)
mapper.select: select * from member where id=#{id} and pw=#{pw}
mapper.update: update member set point=#{point} where id=#{id}
